column5: ahhhhhhhh... still 5 months away before I can fish near this island up in Shiningtree.. don't know if I can last that long......      I can dream can't I     I do like that island...14ft boat..slow trolling..sun beatting down..where's that cold drink........ ...man is it ever snowing in Bradford right now.....damn..there goes my day dream........
ahhhh yes, soft water and green trees, thanks Terry !!
Two and half months for moi.  I'll be kind to those fish and put in some good words for ya, Terry.
everyone of them are still swimming up there, for some else to catch..I didn't even have one shore lunch last year so go get them
Yeah, summer is good times for sure.  Not long now boys.    I'm still lookin forward to some more ice fishing this winter though.
Chasing Capt. Hooked into the West Arm sunrise
Cool pictures! Nothing like warmer weather! I like green!  http://www.shiningtree.com/
Here's some pics last summer when it ended even so hot, we had to cool off between fishing.         Now That's Refreshing
Mmmmmm ... soft water.   And I sit here looking out the window.  Cold, winds-a-howling, blowing snow. I hate winter !
I have my boathouse moved so winter can take a big hike anytime. Bring on blue water and green grass.
